mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id, m.create_time, m.menu_name, m.menu_level, m.sort sort, m.web_name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM s_user_role_middle urm LEFT JOIN s_role r ON urm.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN s_role_menu_middle rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN s_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE urm.user_id = #{userId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id, m.create_time, m.menu_name, m.menu_level, m.sort sort, m.web_name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM s_role_menu_middle rmr LEFT JOIN s_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id
